item.title: Maps of Venice
item.description: Visual component of my undergraduate senior thesis. My thesis research focuses on developing cartographic visualizations that assist in analyzing the historical relationship between urban design and population growth in the shrinking city of Venice.
item.content:encoded:
Visual component of my undergraduate senior thesis. My thesis research focuses on developing cartographic visualizations that assist in analyzing the historical relationship between urban design and population growth in the shrinking city of Venice.

Demo: https://mapsofvenice.com/

Github: https://github.com/yzheng1998/maps-of-venice

item.title: CityScope.js - MIT Media Lab
item.description: The CityScope.js project combines physical 3D models, augmented reality, and real-time prediction to support experts and non-experts in a novel decision-making process to design better cities. Work was done within the City Science Lab at MIT Media Lab.
item.content:encoded:
The CityScope project combines physical 3D models, augmented reality, and real-time prediction to support experts and non-experts in a novel decision-making process to design better cities. Work was done within the City Science Lab at MIT Media Lab.

My contributions: Mobility Simulation Layer, Save/Load Scenarios, Edit Grid Mode enhancements, migrated codebase to React (functional components)

Demo: https://cityscope.media.mit.edu/CS_cityscopeJS/?cityscope=corktown

Github: https://github.com/CityScope/CS_cityscopeJS

Mentor: Ariel Noyman

item.title: Arcturus Orion
item.description: A mapping software that allows users to report and view crime incidents in real time, providing users with predictive analytics regarding threats and safe navigation routing. Contributions made during an internship with a Boston-based startup, Arcturus.
item.content:encoded:
A mapping software that allows users to report and view crime incidents in real time, providing users with predictive analytics regarding threats and safe navigation routing. Contributions made during an internship with a Boston-based startup, Arcturus.

My contributions: Cluster layer and tooltip; Scatter plot timeline; Safe navigation routing (Finds the safest routes that minimize threat risk)

Company Information: https://arcturus.us.com/

item.title: Overtourism in Venice
item.description: This web visualization project uses Deck.gl and Mapbox to visualize the impacts of overtourism in Venice on demographic trends over the past 30 years. Worked in a team of 4 Harvard/MIT students with an MIT Urban Studies PhD student.
item.content:encoded:
This web visualization project uses Deck.gl and Mapbox to visualize the impacts of overtourism in Venice on demographic trends over the past 30 years. Worked in a team of 4 Harvard/MIT students with an MIT Urban Studies PhD student.

My Contributions: All interactive maps

Research Blog: http://www.overtourismvenice.mit.edu/

Github: https://github.com/yzheng1998/overtourism-web

Published In: German International Development Agency: Urbanet
